Business Scenario 3b

The patient has three insurance companies. The total charge for the claim is $1766.50. The primary payer allowed $1600.00 and applied a contractual adjustment of $166.50 as part of the provider’s fee schedule. The allowed amount was paid at 80% after a $500.00 deductible. The primary payer paid $880.00.
